elden-ring.prompt: Describe what we see here and help me understand what's happening. Focus on giving me insights, help me understand, provide truly useful information.
What is the most important, non-trivial hint you can give for this situation?

Give me the story and lore background I might have missed to understand this situation better. Focus on lore, characters, and events that are relevant to the current context. Only mention things from the game past, nothing from the game future.
Which of these items can I safely sell (e.g., because they are abundant) and which should I definitely keep?
For the current level of my character, is this a good weapon or should I be able to find something much better?
What are some really useful things I can craft with the items I have?
What is a very funny joke that is specific to this situtation?
